medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient started having abdominal pain gradually three days ago, described as a persistent ache. Noticed some blood on the toilet paper after a bowel movement one day prior to admission. Reports having chills, but no recorded fevers. Decreased appetite noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes Mellitus type II, Hypertension, Diverticulosis with recent lower GI bleed, Internal hemorrhoids
medical_history.family_history: Father died of stroke at unspecified age. Mother died of diabetes complications at unspecified age.
